event.description: Jason Bartlett homers (4) on a fly ball to right center field.
Carl Crawford singles on a line drive to center fielder Melky Cabrera.
Evan Longoria grounds into a double play, pitcher Andy Pettitte to second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Mark Teixeira. Carl Crawford out at 2nd.
Carlos Pena homers (13) on a fly ball to right center field.
Pat Burrell singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nick Swisher.
Ben Zobrist grounds into a force out, third baseman Ramiro Pena to second baseman Robinson Cano. Pat Burrell out at 2nd.
